review: When trying to access movies or anything other title using fire stick, I get "currently unavailable".If this continues, you can expect a fast return.
author: JACK GARNER

review: Amazing product -SO EASY to use ... Start up took under 10 minutes - service is fantastic - no hiccups at ALL so far ... AmaZon prime selection is great for TV and movies , also runs Netflix and YouTube app with no troubles at all ... AMAZING ! LOVE renting movies on Amazon prime - same day as theater Oprion on some movies is GREAT - and cheaper than our cable "On Demand " rentals ...
author: Pookie "Love"

review: Great product with a great price for the availability of programming options. Easy to set up and works very dependably so far. Very pleased with this purchase.
author: Steve Ellis

review: Just what I wanted.  Works great.  Super easy to set up.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I like it fine but I would like it even more if ABC and CBS apps were on it...
author: Kelsi Lancaster

review: I hate it. It is useless. Haven't been able to view anything with since I got it. What a rip off.
author: JUDY MEYERS

review: Even though I am technically challenged, it was easy to set up. My only problem was getting the remote open to install the batteries. My son had to open it for me and he had a difficult time. It was designed badly.I am really enjoying the many things I can get with my Fire Stick. It's a sinner.
author: Amy Janikas

review: This thing is awesome! Just wish it had HBO Go app
author: Matthew S. Simpson "Simpson"

review: It kept turning off. I could not see the movie I ordered. I don't want to be charged the $2.99
author: kenanwie
